messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do fire vampires attack?
They attack by touching their victims, and can set flammable objects alight by touch.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do investigators mitigate fire vampire damage?
Investigators pass a CON roll, half of the damage inflicted.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do vampires steal magic points from their targets?
They use an opposed POW roll; if they win, they steal 1D10 magic points from the victim.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to fire vampires if they lose a magic point-stealing roll?
They lose one of their own magic points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the heat-shock for the vampire's attack?
To determine the heat-shock, roll 2D6 damage for the vampire's attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the investigator fails to pass a CON roll during the vampire's attack?
The full damage is inflicted.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the target wins the opposed POW roll during the vampire's attack?
The fire vampire loses one of its own magic points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage can a typical handheld fire extinguisher inflict on a fire vampire?
1D6 hit points of damage to it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cost of sanity for seeing a fire vampire?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of the Flying Polyp entity?
They were only partly material
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a notable feature associated with the Flying Polyp?
Colossal foot-prints made up of five circular toe marks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a notable sound associated with the Flying Polyp?
singular whistling noises
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did the unnamed species come to Earth?
seven hundred and fifty million years ago
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What did the unnamed species do to the Great Race of Yith on Earth?
were finally defeated and forced underground
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What still remains in the deep caverns of the unnamed species?
polyps
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the entrances to their dwellings mostly hidden from?
the few beings who chance upon them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What era did the polyps rise up from their subterranean haunts in?
Cretaceous era
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the ancient tales tell about the polyps' powers?
Controlling great winds and targeting individuals
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the location of the polyps' entrances to their dwellings?
Deep within ancient ruins
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is inside the ancient wells sealed over with stone?
The polyps still, ferocious alien fighters
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the entrances to the polyps' dwellings like?
The entrances to their dwellings are mostly deep within ancient ruins.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a unique characteristic of an invisible polyp?
Anyone trying to hit an invisible polyp must make a successful Listen roll to tell where it is.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How can a polyp's attacks be roughly located?
It still can be roughly located by the constant, nauseating piping sound that always accom- plices it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much magic point is spent per round to make a polyp invisible?
By spending 1 magic point per round, a polyp can turn totally invisible.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the required skill to hit a polyp?
Listen
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What penalty die is added to attack rolls if a polyp is hit?
One penalty die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a failed Luck roll when attacking a polyp?
The Polyp phases just at that moment
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can a polyp do when it is invisible?
Use one of the wind attacks or cast spells
